TechNews.Bible
AboutPast IssuesPosts

A newsletter for technologists working on Bible translation

Discover. Learn. Share. Collaborate.

TechNews.Bible exists to curate and develop content for technologists in the Bible translation community. We believe that sharing knowledge will help us learn faster and collaborate better. Examples of the content we aim to share:

  1. News: releases and updates for libraries, tools, content, and projects.
  2. Deep Dives: tutorials, demonstrations, case studies, and post-mortems.
  3. Community Interaction: Requests for feedback, events, employment opportunities, and more.
